markdownRemark.html: http://blog.urbanape.com/post/684440225/some-non-busy-iphone-wallpapers This popped up in my feed reader (via Shawn Blanc). The are neat wallpapers, but I like the color choices most of all. Consider them filed away for future usage/theft.
